Restaurant.Description:
A burger is a flat round mass of minced meat or vegetables, 
which is fried and
often eaten in a bread roll

Momo are bite-size dumplings made with a spoonful of 
stuffing wrapped in
dough. Momo are usually steamed, though they are sometimes fried or steamfried.

pizza, dish of Italian origin consisting of a flattened disk of 
bread dough topped
with some combination of olive oil, oregano, tomato, olives, mozzarella or 
other cheese
